name: The Union - Cooperative
description:
![null]() ## The Union - Cooperative
### Episode 1 - In the Middle of Doom **This map is released only in battle.net (enGB)** Your squad trying to secure area in planet, but Zerg Swarm is hard enemy. 1. Survive with your comrade in Cooperative Mission.
2. You can choose 2 languages (EN, CZ) - Your Ghosts must survive
- There is no respawn, move carefully
- Play as a team
- Complete all objectives
- Only Ghosts can interact with other
- Marines and Ghosts have slightly regeneration ###### General
Many bugs was repaired, but my EN version can have many grammatical mistakes (My English is really bad). So, if someone see any mistakes in this map, please tell me where. :D You will have my thanks :) Thanks to Mither and Perry for testing. ###### Update 1.37
Many EN mistakes was repaired.
Special thanks to Kes from starcraftcz.com community for better translation.
author: _ForgeUser4378184
